com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions

Interface ISCUIExtensionsPathProviderV2

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISCUIExtensionsPathProvider

    public interface ISCUIExtensionsPathProviderV2
extends ISCUIExtensionsPathProvider
    This interface needs to be implemented if differential extensibility needs to be achieved with framework automatically picking up extension mashUps, JSlib and jsp files from specific path. This extends ISCUIExtensionsPathProvider and provides additional capability to create org-specific extensions as well. vbaranwal

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isPathBasedExtnEnabledForUser(SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method returns the boolean to signify whether the current logged in user is an enterprise user or not.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions.ISCUIExtensionsPathProvider

        getExtnPathIdentifier, getExtnPathIdentifierHierarchy, isPathBasedExtnEnabled

    • Method Detail

      • isPathBasedExtnEnabledForUser

        boolean isPathBasedExtnEnabledForUser(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method returns the boolean to signify whether the current logged in user is an enterprise user or not. If this returns true, extensions will be created for path identifier returned by ISCUIExtensionsPathProvider#getExtnPathIdentifier(SCUIContext). This method is only used when extensibility mode is on (that is -DuiExtensibilityMode=true in runtime parameter) to determine whether logged-in user can create base extensions (when false is returned) or create org-specific extension (that is the path identifier). boolean
